scripts.dev: pnpm -C server dev & pnpm -C frontend dev
scripts.dev:pl: zsh -lc 'branch="$(git branch --show-current)"; [[ -n "$branch" ]] || { echo "Failed to detect current git branch." >&2; exit 1; }; base="${branch//\//-}"; portless "${base}-api" pnpm -C server dev & api_pid=$!; trap "kill $api_pid" EXIT INT TERM; PORTLESS_BASE="$base" portless "${base}-web" pnpm -C frontend dev; wait'
scripts.build: pnpm -C frontend build && pnpm -C server build
scripts.lint: pnpm -C frontend lint && pnpm -C server lint
